title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new GraphQL types for organization property conditions: `OrganizationPropertyConditionTarget`, `OrganizationPropertyConditionTargetInput`, `OrganizationPropertyTargetDefinition`, and `OrganizationPropertyTargetDefinitionInput`.
Extended `RepositoryRuleConditions` and `RepositoryRuleConditionsInput` with `organizationProperty` fields for repository rule configuration.
Updated documentation for `UpdateProjectV2FieldInput` to clarify partial update behavior for `ITERATION` and `SINGLE_SELECT` field configurations.
Recorded changes in `changelog.json` for schema updates.
summary:
- Added new GraphQL types for organization property conditions: `OrganizationPropertyConditionTarget`, `OrganizationPropertyConditionTargetInput`, `OrganizationPropertyTargetDefinition`, and `OrganizationPropertyTargetDefinitionInput`.
- Extended `RepositoryRuleConditions` and `RepositoryRuleConditionsInput` with `organizationProperty` fields for repository rule configuration.
- Added `INCONCLUSIVE` enum value to `RepositoryVulnerabilityAlertDependencyRelationship`.
- Updated documentation for `UpdateProjectV2FieldInput` to clarify partial update behavior for `ITERATION` and `SINGLE_SELECT` field configurations.
- Recorded changes in `changelog.json` for schema updates.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added new GraphQL types for organization property conditions: `OrganizationPropertyConditionTarget`, `OrganizationPropertyConditionTargetInput`, `OrganizationPropertyTargetDefinition`, and `OrganizationPropertyTargetDefinitionInput`.
- Extended `RepositoryRuleConditions` and `RepositoryRuleConditionsInput` with `organizationProperty` fields for repository rule configuration.
- Added `INCONCLUSIVE` enum value to `RepositoryVulnerabilityAlertDependencyRelationship`.
- Updated documentation for `UpdateProjectV2FieldInput` to clarify partial update behavior for `ITERATION` and `SINGLE_SELECT` field configurations.
- Recorded changes in `changelog.json` for schema updates.

### Title
Add organization property conditions to repository rules and update project field docs
